## Elegant & Earthy
We wanted to make something special with the extraordinary HopeWell Vineyards. This 100% Pommard Pinot Noir is fermented with uncrushed grape clusters to showcase the best HopeWell has to offer. Leaving 35% of the wine whole-cluster brings out warm notes of Cedar and Sandalwood, accompanied by Cranberry and Rosemary on the finish. Limited Run, only 50 cases produced. 14.3% ALC/VOL
$48.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
